reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress feminine without being fussy and good for casual wear, with true-to-size measurements. However, the fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it great while others say it's too short. Moreover, the material quality is mixed, with some praising it while others find it feels cheap, and several customers note it's too see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable + Sexy + Versatile — The Little White Dress I Didn’t Know I Needed
items.body: This GORGLITTER button-up mini dress is such a vibe. It hits that perfect balance of classy-meets-sexy, and the versatility is next-level. You can style this so many ways that it basically pays for itself. Fit & Sizing (I’m 125 lbs, 34D): The fit is very on point—flattering, tailored-looking, and feminine. Just note: I’m a 34D and it almost creates a button gap across the bust. Not enough to return it, but enough that you might want to wear a seamless bra or a little fashion tape if you’re fuller-chested. If you're between sizes or bustier, you may want to size up. Feel: The fabric is soft, lightweight, and comfortable even without stretch. It has that flowy, flared movement that looks polished but still easy to wear. Look: This dress is simply adorable and subtly sexy. The button-up detail lets you create the vibe—fully buttoned for daytime or work, and unbuttoned a little for a night-out look. The lapel collar + pleats make it look more structured and expensive. How I’m Styling It: Daytime: blazer + tights + boots Work: belted with an overcoat Night out: unbuttoned with high-heeled sandals or knee-high boots Casual: denim jacket + sneakers Versatility: Perfect for everything—work, holidays, dates, shopping days, brunch, or a night out. It’s one of those “simple but powerful” pieces that transforms depending on how you style it. If you want a dress that can go from polished to sexy with one outfit change, this is it. Read more
items.author: Stephanie Ann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy and comfy
items.body: Great dress! The material does wrinkle easily, but it was still flattering and comfortable. I am 5’6 and around 140lbs. I got a small and I still had plenty of breathing room. Paired it with the corset belt and I think it was the exact mix of classy and comfy I aim for. Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits great and is super cute.
items.body: I listened to Amazon's size suggestion and got the small. I'm normally a size medium or even a large. For reference, I am 5'2" and 145 lbs. This fit absolutely incredible and looks REALLY cute on. I'm a bit conflicted because it's not really see through but because it's white, it does show just a bit of the undergarments but I'm going to try to see if I can find some that are a little less showing and try to make it work because this REALLY is an adorable and well fitting little dress. Read more
items.author: julie rubin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not see through!
items.body: It’s well made and not see through. Read more
items.author: charlene m

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Very short and very polyester.
items.body: I got it for a costume and it'll be fine for that but if you want to wear it as a dress, it's SHORT. If you size up, the sleeves are going to be very long. The material is pretty much glorified plastic. Read more
items.author: Laura Z.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but too big
items.body: The material isn’t bad, but for almost $50, I’d want better quality. Sizing is off, so it’s not as cinched in. While the style itself is made to cinch in, unless you are already like that the effect will just not look great. Sizing is big, so I would order a smaller size than what they recommend. Still cute, but for the price and quality ill just buy a long t-shirt button down and put a belt at the waist for the hourglass illusion. Read more
items.author: Each Day is a Gift

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a cute classic piece for a time capsule wardrobe
items.body: So so pretty much prettier in real life than I even imagined I do usually wear a medium and I accidentally bought a small and I’m so glad I did because it fits like a glove. It’s beautiful. Read more
items.author: Evelyn Lorae

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White, Solid White, Black, Solid Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
